issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A fix has been committed, and will be part of the next release
status.name: Release Pending

fields.description:
We currently do not close ScrollableResults after use resulting in cloud-exhaust.log log output:

{code}
Tue Jun 6 16:27:18 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:cloudwatch-alarm-work-pool-0] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:27:55 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:compute-metrics-flush-0] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:28:18 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:cloudwatch-alarm-work-pool-1] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:28:55 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:compute-metrics-flush-0] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:29:18 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:cloudwatch-alarm-work-pool-2] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:29:55 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:compute-metrics-flush-0] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:30:18 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:cloudwatch-alarm-work-pool-3] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:30:55 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:compute-metrics-flush-0] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:31:18 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:cloudwatch-alarm-work-pool-4] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:31:55 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:compute-metrics-flush-0] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
Tue Jun 6 16:32:18 2017  INFO [org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl:cloudwatch-alarm-work-pool-0] HHH000106: Forcing container resource cleanup on transaction completion
{code}

We should close the ScrollableResults resources after use.

comments.body: To verify check the log output is no longer present on cloud controller or ufs hosts. We could also check for any regressions in functionality for ec2 metrics or the cloudwatch GetMetricStatistics action and cloudwatch alarm evaluation.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.1-0.25930.61.20170731git17c94f6.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deployed Eucalyptus 4.4 Cloud with Edge networking - [hspencer-839-maint-4.4|hspencer-839-maint-4.4]
# Created non-eucalyptus account (e.g. development-operations)
# Bundled, uploaded and registered Ubuntu Xenial Cloud Image
# As development-operations admin user, used linked {{cfn-elb-asg-tagging-template.json}} template and created an ELB+ASG stack (monitoring enabled):
{code}
[root@g-12-10 ~]# euform-create-stack NginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-asg-tagging-template.json --parameter ImageId=emi-44c4f596 --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter InstanceType=m1.medium --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.d-23.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000897607864:stack/NginxStack/2320b164-6a0d-4809-96b7-0078b6ba88e5
[root@g-12-10 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	NginxStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		AWS CloudFormation Sample Template AutoScalingSingleAZ: Create a single-az, load balanced and Auto Scaled sample web site running on an Nginx Web Server. The application is configured to span in one availability zone (one cluster) and is Auto-Scaled based on the CPU utilization of the web servers.	2017-08-09T17:35:06.522Z
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-44c4f596
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.d-23.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	URL	http://NginxSta-ElasticLo-JCSN9HHFUYMJQ-000897607864.lb.d-23.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
[root@g-12-10 ~]# curl -I http://NginxSta-ElasticLo-JCSN9HHFUYMJQ-000897607864.lb.d-23.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.3 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 09 Aug 2017 17:57:35 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 612
Last-Modified: Wed, 09 Aug 2017 17:37:30 GMT
ETag: "598b485a-264"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
{code}
# Confirmed log message didn't show up on the UFS and CLC:
{code}
## UFS ##
[root@d-23 ~]# grep  ScrollableResults /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
[root@d-23 ~]# grep "Forcing container resource"  /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
[root@d-23 ~]# grep "org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl" /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
[root@d-23 ~]#

## CLC ##
[root@g-12-10 ~]# grep "org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorImpl" /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
[root@g-12-10 ~]# grep  ScrollableResults /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
[root@g-12-10 ~]# grep "Forcing container resource"  /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
[root@g-12-10 ~]#
{code}
# Confirmed CloudWatch and metrics worked as expected:
{code}
[root@g-12-10 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region devops-admin@
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	NginxStack-LaunchConfig-GL9EIFENKVUB1	one	NginxSta-ElasticLo-JCSN9HHFUYMJQ	2	4	2Default
INSTANCE	i-f0a5abc5	one	InService	Healthy	NginxStack-LaunchConfig-GL9EIFENKVUB1
INSTANCE	i-e757120e	one	InService	Healthy	NginxStack-LaunchConfig-GL9EIFENKVUB1
TAG	auto-scaling-group	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	Name	NginxStack	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	WebServerGroup	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000897607864:stack/NginxStack/2320b164-6a0d-4809-96b7-0078b6ba88e5	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	NginxStack	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	test:tag:1	testvalueA	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	test:tag:2	testvalueB	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	test:tag:3	testvalueC	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	NginxStack-WebServerGroup-QQ7PDBOC5GQD9	test:tag:4	testvalueD	true

[root@g-12-10 ~]# euwatch-get-stats -n AWS/EC2 -s Average --dimensions InstanceId=i-f0a5abc5 CPUUtilization --region devops-admin@
